====== JCacheStorageFile ======
{#JAPI Joomla.Framework Cache JCacheStorageFile #}

File cache storage handler
===== Methods =====
^ Method ^ Description ^
| [[JCacheStorageFile-__construct|{{references:Method.png?nolink}}]] [[JCacheStorageFile-__construct|__construct]] | Constructor |
| [[JCacheStorageFile-clean|{{references:Method.png?nolink}}]] [[JCacheStorageFile-clean|clean]] | Clean cache for a group given a mode.<p>group mode		: cleans all cache in the group  notgroup mode	: cleans all cache not in the group</p> |
| [[JCacheStorageFile-gc|{{references:Method.png?nolink}}]] [[JCacheStorageFile-gc|gc]] | Garbage collect expired cache data |
| [[JCacheStorageFile-get|{{references:Method.png?nolink}}]] [[JCacheStorageFile-get|get]] | Get cached data from a file by id and group |
| [[JCacheStorageFile-remove|{{references:Method.png?nolink}}]] [[JCacheStorageFile-remove|remove]] | Remove a cached data file by id and group |
| [[JCacheStorageFile-store|{{references:Method.png?nolink}}]] [[JCacheStorageFile-store|store]] | Store the data to a file by id and group |
| [[JCacheStorageFile-test|{{references:Method.png?nolink}}]] [[JCacheStorageFile-test|test]] | Test to see if the cache storage is available. |

----
